text: Yuelushannus is a genus of spiders in the Linyphiidae family described in May 2020 by Irfan et al. It contains two species, Y. alatus and Y. barbatus. Both species are found in the Hunan and Hubei provinces of China. The genus name is derived from the type locality, Yuelu Mountain in the province of Hunan. == See also == * List of Linyphiidae species (Q–Z) == References == Category:Linyphiidae Category:Araneomorphae genera
title: Yuelushannus
